channel.title: Newshour
channel.description: Global news and analysis from the BBC World Service, twice a day, every day of the year. Join our leading team of presenters for the best interviews, features and analysis of world events.
channel.itunes:summary: Global news and analysis from the BBC World Service, twice a day, every day of the year. Join our leading team of presenters for the best interviews, features and analysis of world events.
channel.itunes:author: BBC World Service
channel.itunes:keywords: Global news, analysis, BBC, World Service
channel.media:keywords: Global news, analysis, BBC, World Service
